meanings.definition: The act of depicting or representing someone or something in a work of art or literature.
meanings.sent1: Her portrayal of the character in the play was very convincing.
meanings.sent2: The artist's portrayal of the sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent3: The portrayal of the cat wearing a hat in the story made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His portrayal of emotions through dance was like a painting coming to life.
meanings.sent5: The vivid portrayal of the storm in the novel stayed with me long after I finished reading.

meanings.definition: A representation or description of someone or something in a particular way.
meanings.sent1: The media's portrayal of the event was misleading.
meanings.sent2: His portrayal of the historical figure was accurate and detailed.
meanings.sent3: The portrayal of the talking dog in the movie added a fun twist.
meanings.sent4: Her portrayal of the situation as a puzzle helped us understand it better.
meanings.sent5: The portrayal of friendship in the story was heartwarming and relatable.
